result.title: Assessment, recommendations and roadmap
result.description:
Assessment, recommendations and roadmap:
D47 contains an assessment, recommendations and a roadmap addressing:
1) certification, monitoring and enforcement of low emission vessels 2) supporting measures for engine rooms improvements of vessels 3) more skilled workforce and quality jobs 4) measures for energy efficient navigations
